bug.author: boxerab
bug.summary: Native Tensorflow object detection example crashes
bug.description:
<denchmark-code> $ ./nnstreamer_example_object_detection_tf
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::logic_error' what(): basic_string::_M_construct null not valid Aborted (core dumped) </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1159>#1159</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

GDB backtrace: <denchmark-code>#0 0x00007ffff6610e97 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51 #1 0x00007ffff6612801 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:79 #2 0x00007ffff6c678b7 in () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 #3 0x00007ffff6c6da06 in () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 #4 0x00007ffff6c6da41 in () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 #5 0x00007ffff6c6dc74 in () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 #6 0x00007ffff6c696f7 in () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 #7 0x00007ffff6d0240d in void std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_construct<char const*>(char const*, char const*, std::forward_iterator_tag) () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 #8 0x00007fffeff0c7a2 in TFCore::loadModel() (this=0x555556074000) at ../ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_core.cc:105 #9 0x00007fffeff0c71b in TFCore::init(_GstTensorFilterProperties const*) (this=0x555556074000, prop=0x555555a0a788) at ../ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_core.cc:74 #10 0x00007fffeff0e475 in tf_core_init(void*, GstTensorFilterProperties const*) (tf=0x555556074000, prop=0x555555a0a788) at ../ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_core.cc:449 #11 0x00007fffeff0c327 in tf_loadModelFile (prop=0x555555a0a788, private_data=0x555555a0a780) at ../ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow.c:81 #12 0x00007fffeff0c385 in tf_open (prop=0x555555a0a788, private_data=0x555555a0a780) at ../ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow.c:100
</denchmark-code>
It looks like the model_path is null. Should have a null check on the path, I guess.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/helloahn>@helloahn</denchmark-link> Please add null and value validity check (and error reporting/exception handling) to tensorflow-core/tensorflow-lite-core regarding model file paths.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/pull/1174>#1174</denchmark-link> figures it out. sorry for the late reply :)
I'd like to close this non-active issue.
